survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Mental Health Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in AI-powered mental health applications. The feedback will help developers and service providers enhance app features and user experience.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered mental health app have you used in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture apps not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a dropdown menu with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered mental health app have you used in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered features of the app?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected an app in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.

script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected an app in Q1

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Display as checkboxes with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

questions.question_text: How has using an AI-powered mental health app impacted your overall mental well-being?
